FieldDef.Name: ExecutionTimeLimit
FieldDef.Description: Execution time limit for single simulation run (0= no limit)

Port.Name: AllParameters
Port.Description: All input parameters of the simualtion (read only)

Port.Name: VariableParameters
Port.Description: Variable input parameters of the simualtion

Port.Name: AllSpecies
Port.Description: All species of the simualtion (read only)

Port.Name: AllObservers
Port.Description: All observers of the simualtion (read only)

Port.Name: SpeciesTimeSchema
Port.Description: Output time schema for some species, which overrides global output time schema

Port.Name: AllTableParameters
Port.Description: All table input parameters of the simualtion (read only)

Port.Name: VariableTableParameters
Port.Description: Variable table input parameters of the simualtion
